WAKFU Manga

See the heroes of WAKFU again in the brand new manga series by Tot, the creator of DOFUS and WAKFU! The manga story directly follows season 2 of the TV series.

Tofuâ€™s company has scattered a little: Yugo, Ruel, Percedal, Amalia and Evangelyne are now living their lives, each on their own. Our friends finally meet again to celebrate one of them when a spoilsport interrupts the celebrationâ€¦
